I think all you need to do is change  lines 350 and 351 of genBSDF.pl so
they look like this:


Kazi = 360*DEGREE * Kcol / Knaz(Krow);
Kpol = DEGREE * (0.5*Kpola(Krow) + 0.5*Kpola(Krow-1));


(this only changes it for Klems BSDF generation)


Andy
